1.1.name: wordpress/wp-clockcountdown
1.1.description: We present you a premium wordpress plugin which will enhance your webpage. Wordpress Flash clock allows you to display a clock on your page. With or without reflection wp clock will enhance the look of your website. A live example of the widget: http://premiumcoding.com/wordpress-flash-clock-plugin. If you want a countdown / counter of the same design please check http://premiumcoding.com/wordpress-count-down/
